summary: This module implements GPU‑accelerated signal‑processing utilities such as convolution, correlation, median filtering, order filtering, and Wiener deconvolution for CuPy arrays, mirroring the functionality of SciPy's signaltools.
business_intent: Enable high‑performance scientific and engineering applications to perform common signal‑processing operations on large datasets using NVIDIA GPUs via CuPy, reducing computation time compared to CPU‑only implementations.
